actions.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment adds language to the GAO study called for in the bill and requires the GAO to determine the extent to which eligibility standards for pre-FIRM properties were inconsistent and resulted in disparities in coverage among such properties and their owners.
purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 109-530 to add a provision into the GAO study on the status of the national flood insurance program for certain pre-FIRM properties that seeks to identify any inconsistencies in eligibility standards for pre- FIRM coverage.
